term.title: ring-opening copolymerization

item.text: A copolymerization which is a ring-opening polymerization with respect to at least one monomer.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2308 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
